snippet: Mexico has announced plans for tightened deportation and border control policies as its migrant numbers surge in response to worsening gang violence in Central America.
lead_paragraph: Mexico has announced plans for tightened deportation and border control policies as its migrant numbers surge in response to worsening gang violence in Central America.

headline.main: On Southern Border, Mexico Faces Crisis of Its Own
headline.print_headline: On Southern Border, Mexico Faces Crisis of Its Own
